Text.Page:
! I've gotten a request for reinforcements from the Celestial Hills. Drustan, out at Casidhe's Stand needs help at once. I don't have the soldiers to spare, but I think you might be just what he needs.

He's a little frayed, but he's a good man. Do what you can, my friend. For the federation!

You're the relief? One soldier?

Damn Daven's eyes. We need more help than that but let's put you to work. The orcans are massing for an attack. I want you to preemptively weed them out. Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:7#5#Red Fang Orcans} and {@LinkCreature:7#6#Red Fang Fighters}, and bring back their fangs.

Perhaps that will give us the rest we need. Take the field!

Well done! That's a lot of fangs.

That'll scare them off for a bit, but they'll be back. Hopefully, we'll be reinforced by then.

I'm glad you're here, . Keep up the good work.
You've got your orders, soldier. Get moving.
